item.title: About
item.description: I hold a Bachlors and a Masters degree in Computer Science. In the beggining of my career I spent 2.5 years working as a research assitant, under Dr. Katerina Goseva, studying the characteristics of HTTP attacks and vulnerability scans using data mining and patter recognition. After getting my masters degree, I realized that academia is not my cup of tea, therefore, I left West Virigina University in 2014 and joined alarm.
